DOC.brief_title: Cohort Study Assess Level Compliance Undertaking Breast Self Examination Among Women Attending Preventive Oncology Clinic
DOC.detailed_description: This observational cohort study BSE among woman attend Preventive Oncology ( PO ) Clinic , TMH . All woman attend screen common cancer Preventive Oncology OPD TMH demonstrate technique BSE advise , perform BSE . Women attend PO clinic mention residential address Mumbai provide contact number invite participate study . They explain study protocol interested participating offer informed consent form . The woman sign inform consent form enrol trial . The data regard socio-demographic detail level knowledge , attitude practice ( KAP ) breast cancer BSE collect participate woman . They ask doubt regard technique BSE willingness perform BSE . Thereafter , follow-up period 3 month , woman contact telephonically collect data ass level compliance BSE reason non-compliance , . Also , compliant woman ask observed abnormal change breast visit clinician . And subsequently , health care seek behaviour study . The data collect follow-up entered SPSS software analyze use simple statistical test like mean , chi-square , t-test univariate multivariate analysis .
DOC.criteria: Women attend Preventive Oncology Clinic month NovemberDecember 2010 . Women undertake BSE training . Residential address mention Mumbai . Contact number available . Women reside outside Mumbai , Maharashtra .
